metadata.Title: CVE-2021-34434 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: In Eclipse Mosquitto versions 2.0 to 2.0.11, when using the dynamicsecurity plugin, if the ability for a client to make subscriptions on atopic is revoked when a durable client is offline, then existingsubscriptions for that client are not revoked.

criterions.comment: mosquitto: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
